name: .RM2
summary: Learn about .RM2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open RM2 files with Stellar Top Hat MultiMino 2: Polyform. To do this, place the file in the game's replay directory (if required by the version you are using) or select it directly from the in-game replay menu. Once loaded, the game will play back the recorded match exactly as it happened.
